  1. Description
  2. Classes and Interfaces

Unnamed Package

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AbnormalUsageAlertUI
    A themed Swing window that displays abnormal usage alerts produced by AlertCenter.
    Alert
    Represents an alert for abnormal usage patterns (e.g., high consumption, leak).
    AlertCenter
    Centralized utility for recording, formatting, and clearing abnormal usage alerts (e.g., water consumption) for smart meters.
    GenerateReportUI
    A themed Swing window for generating and displaying a usage report over a user-selected date range.
    GenerateUsageReport
    Console application that simulates generating a simple usage report for a user-specified period.
    Main
    Application entry point for the Water Meter ID UI.
    MainDashboardUI
    Main application dashboard window shown after a user signs in with a meter ID.
    RecordDailyUsageUI
    A themed Swing window for recording a single day's water usage (in liters).
    Report
     
    UsageRecord
    Represents a water usage record with date and amount information.
    UsageReport
    Concrete implementation of Report that renders a detailed water usage report for a given meter over a specified period.
    User
    Represents a system user with login capabilities and meter access.
    Validator
    Utility class with simple, stateless validators for water-meter inputs.
    WaterMeter
    Simple data class representing a water meter and its associated metadata.
    WaterMeterAccess
    Console-based access gate for the water meter system.
    WaterMeterIDUI
    Sign-in window for the WaterSpace application.
    WaterTheme
    Theme utilities for building a cohesive "water" look invalid input: '&' feel across Swing windows.
    WaterUsageMonitor
    Central monitoring system for water usage management.
    WaterUsageRecorder
    Console utility for recording a single day's water usage.
